# init(index:)

**Initializer**

Initializes an index path with a single node.

## Declaration

```swift
convenience init(index: Int)
```

## Parameters

- **index**: Index of the item in node 0 to point to.

## Return Value

Initialized [doc://com.apple.foundation/documentation/Foundation/NSIndexPath] object representing a one-node index path with `index`.

## Creating and Initializing Index Paths

- **init(indexes:length:)**: Initializes an index path with the given nodes and length.
